div.div: This page is designed to house all information and links for parents and students to access during the school closure
Junior-senior high school students are required to log in and fill out an attendance form when participating in daily online classes.
Crafton Elementary students, can you guess the titles of some of the favorite books selected by your teachers? You just might be surprised...
The Board of Directors is providing notice that a Finance Committee Meeting is scheduled for Tuesday, May 12, 2020 at 7:00 PM and will be held remotely.
Stayed informed about school district events, student activities and more by following us on Twitter
Registration paperwork for kindergarten enrollment is now being accepted for children of the District who will be five years-of-age on or before August 15, 2020.
The safety and well-being of our students and staff in the Carlynton School District is paramount.
The 2020 FUNDay ticket for the school picnic will be sold be sold online for $29. Kennywood has made the decision to cancel the in-school ticket sale.

strong.style: color: rgb(0, 102, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; text-align: center;

a.title: Link to PA Future Ready Index

p.span: located just six miles southwest of Pittsburgh is a small district uniting three proud communities, Carnegie, Crafton and Rosslyn Farms, with various ethnic, racial and socioeconomic populations. Our schools offer small class sizes that allow for a personal approach to instruction. We present a challenging curriculum to encourage all students to excel as independent thinkers and life-long learners, while offering each the support and motivation to do so with success.

em.span: The Carlynton School District welcomes inquiries from families considering relocation to our community. We invite you to explore our website for valuable information about our schools.
